summary: This is an email chain from July 9, 2019, discussing a potential victim who called with information about Jeffrey Epstein. The emails coordinate a meeting and a call with counsel regarding this individual.

persons.name: E ll
persons.context: Appears as a sender in the email chain, acknowledging a message and stating 'We'll follow up.'

events.title: Potential victim call received
events.description: CSOs (likely Corporate Security Officers or similar) received a telephone call from a female who identified herself and allegedly has information about Epstein.

events.title: Coordination call with counsel
events.description: A call with counsel for an unspecified party was scheduled for 10:00 AM, with a meeting planned for 9:45 AM to discuss the potential victim and other issues.

keyFacts: On July 8, 2019, a female potential victim called with information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The email chain on July 9, 2019, shows coordination among parties to discuss this individual and other issues.
A call with legal counsel was scheduled for the morning of July 9, 2019.
The document is an internal email chain, indicating an active response to new information about Epstein in mid-2019.
Names of key correspondents and the potential victim appear to be redacted or omitted from the provided text.
